elements.Text: Some people who take tamoxifen or aromatase inhibitors, such as Anastrozole (Arimidex) and Letrozole (Femara), experience pain and stiffness, especially in their joints.  The pain can be in a number of places on the body including the spine, hips, shoulders, elbows, wrists, knees, and feet.  The pain can start at any time.  This side effect can last for a long time or it can start and then stop.
